name: /\OG Astro - The Genesis Short/\
description:
Originally created for the
internationally renowned design
conference Semi Permanent,
this short film was the genesis of
the "OG Astro". It charts the
allegorical birth, growth and life
of an artist. Being one of the
early examples of CG art that
relied heavily on GPU rendering
capabilities, it quickly garnered
accolades and inspired a
generation of digital artists to
push the boundaries of what
could be created on home
computers.
